listitem.para: SWR_ICAS1_GW_21252 SWR_ICAS1_GW_21305 SWR_ICAS1_GW_7596 This function is also given by architectural requirements: EA path: "VW_ICAS1.Chorus.All_Cores.SoftwareDecomposition.ComplexDeviceDrivers.Diag_Chorus_RL78.SW Architecture.Static.Interfaces" Design Decision - Justification. This is the cyclic function for receiving and processing the data from RL78. Based on this Data the Chorus will react accordingly.

SWR_ICAS1_GW_21244 SWR_ICAS1_GW_21305 This function is also given by architectural requirements: EA path: "VW_ICAS1.Chorus.All_Cores.SoftwareDecomposition.ComplexDeviceDrivers.Diag_Chorus_RL78.SW Architecture.Static.Interfaces" Design Decision - Justification. This is an external interface defined in SWA to be called by CRC32_mng component when needs to retrieve/request CRC from RL78.

SWR_ICAS1_GW_7339 Design Decision - Justification. This function implements the following architectural element: EA path: "VW_ICAS1.Chorus.All_Cores.SoftwareDecomposition.ComplexDeviceDrivers.Diag_Chorus_RL78.SW Architecture.Dynamic.WDG communication DTC 0x000121"

SWR_ICAS1_GW_21245 SWR_ICAS1_GW_21517 SWR_ICAS1_GW_21243 SWR_ICAS1_GW_21252 SWR_ICAS1_GW_21244 This function is also given by architectural requirements: EA path: "VW_ICAS1.Chorus.All_Cores.SoftwareDecomposition.ComplexDeviceDrivers.Diag_Chorus_RL78.SW Architecture.Static.Interfaces" Design Decision - Justification. This is an external interface defined in SWA to be called by Spi2SysWD component that handles the communication between Chorus and RL78.

SWR_ICAS1_GW_11545, SWR_ICAS1_GW_11546, SWR_ICAS1_GW_11548, SWR_ICAS1_GW_11556, SWR_ICAS1_GW_11557, SWR_ICAS1_GW_11558, SWR_ICAS1_GW_11559, SWR_ICAS1_GW_21506, SWR_ICAS1_GW_3313, SWR_ICAS1_GW_3314, SWR_ICAS1_GW_3316, SWR_ICAS1_GW_7333, SWR_ICAS1_GW_7334, SWR_ICAS1_GW_7336, SWR_ICAS1_GW_7337, SWR_ICAS1_GW_7338, SWR_ICAS1_GW_7339, SWR_ICAS1_GW_7345, SWR_ICAS1_GW_7346, SWR_ICAS1_GW_7347, SWR_ICAS1_GW_7348, SWR_ICAS1_GW_7396 Design Decision - Justification. In case of DTC received from RL78 this function will handle the setting/resetting/clearing DTC according to status by sending the corresponding request to DEM.
